contents:
Planning a girls’ trip to NYC? Let WestHouse and NOMI Beauty, our in-room beauty partner, make your stay memorable. Stay in a suite, enjoy a 3-hour makeup lesson for 2 and savor delicious cupcakes from Magnolia! Every girl’s perfect pampering session.

Must be booked 7-days in advance
seo_description: Planning a girls trip to NYC? Enjoy a pampering session at the WestHouse Hotel - includes a Luxury suite, 3 hour make-up lesson for 2 plus delicious cupcakes!
seo_title: Girls Pamper Package in NYC | Offers at WestHouse Hotel NY
title: Girls Getaway
